attributes.action: carry out a full and open investigation into the Baby P case.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To never allow the appalling and terrible mistakes that led to that poor toddler being left with sub-humans.
The social workers, police etc need to be held to account, and people fired for allowing this to carry on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
